IEnterpriseLmsProgressTracking.description:
Progress tracking record capturing detailed interaction metrics for a learner's engagement with specific content, including time spent, assessment attempts, and engagement score.

This entity supports auditing, learner analytics, and progress monitoring.

Soft deletion is supported through the nullable deleted_at property.

learner_id.description: Identifier of the learner who this progress tracking belongs to.

content_id.description: Identifier of the content item tracked for progress.

time_spent_seconds.description: Total time spent on content in seconds.

IEnterpriseLmsProgressTracking.ICreate.description:
Create model for learner progress tracking.

Contains essential metrics for content engagement and assessment attempts.

All fields are required to create a new record.

limit.description: Limit of records per page

IEnterpriseLmsProgressTracking.IRequest.description:
Request model for querying learner progress tracking entries.

Includes pagination and optional filters for learner and content IDs.

time_spent_seconds.description: Total time spent on the content in seconds

IEnterpriseLmsProgressTracking.IUpdate.description:
Request type for updating progress tracking metrics with required fields.

Allows modification of metrics such as time spent, attempts, and engagement.

id.description: Unique ID of the compliance record

tenant_id.description: Tenant organization ID

compliance_type.description: Compliance category, e.g., regulatory, internal audit

compliance_status.description: Current status such as passed, failed, pending

IEnterpriseLmsComplianceRecords.description:
Comprehensive learner compliance audit record capturing type, status, and notes.

Supports regulatory reporting and auditing.

limit.description: Limit of records per page

tenant_id.description: Filter by tenant ID

search.description: Full-text search in compliance notes

IEnterpriseLmsComplianceRecords.IRequest.description: Parameters for filtering and paginating learner compliance records.

id.description: Unique identifier of the tenant

IEnterpriseLmsTenant.ISummary.description:
Summary information of a tenant organization containing the unique identifier, tenant code, and full name.

Used mainly for listing tenants with minimal essential data.

IEnterpriseLmsSystemConfigurations.ISumm.description:
Summary of system configuration settings.

Represents key-value pairs of configuration data with optional descriptions.

This schema corresponds to the system-wide configurations table in Enterprise LMS.

value.description: Serialized value corresponding to the key.

oneOf.description: Optional description providing context for the configuration.

description.description: Optional description providing context for the configuration.

IEnterpriseLmsAuditLog.ISummary.description:
Summary view of audit logs used for concise event representation.

Includes the action performed, optional detailed description, and creation timestamp.

This schema helps to display logs efficiently in paginated listings.

action.description: Action performed in the audit log.

oneOf.description: Optional detailed event metadata.

description.description: Optional detailed event metadata.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the event occurred.

IEnterpriseLmsSession.ISummary.description:
Summary view of active user sessions.

Highlights key session information such as the session token, optional client IP,
optional device information, creation, and expiry times.

Supports lightweight session listings for administrative monitoring and management.

session_token.description: Opaque session token string in use.

oneOf.description: Client IP address, if known.
Information about client device or browser.

device_info.description: Information about client device or browser.

IEnterpriseLmsRolePermissions.ISummary.description:
Summary view of role permission entities.

Includes the permission key, description, and whether the permission is granted.

This schema is used for listing and filtering role permissions efficiently.

permission_key.description: Unique identifier key for the permission.

oneOf.description: Optional human-readable description of the permission.

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the permission.

is_allowed.description: Indicates if the permission is granted or denied.

id.description: Primary Key.

integration_name.description: Name of the external integration platform or service, e.g., Stripe, SendGrid, Mixpanel.

config_key.description: Key or identifier for this configuration entry.

enabled.description: Flag indicating whether this integration config is active.

created_at.description: Timestamp when this configuration was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this configuration was last updated.

IEnterpriseLmsIntegrationSetting.ISummar.description: Summary information of integration settings referencing the enterprise_lms_integration_settings table in Prisma schema. Includes essential identification, activation status, and metadata timestamps.

id.description: Primary Key.

notification_type.description: Type of notification, e.g., email, sms, push.

recipient_identifier.description: Recipient identifier such as email address, phone number, or device token.

delivery_status.description: Current delivery status such as sent, failed, queued.

IEnterpriseLmsNotificationLog.ISummary.description: Paginated summary information of notification logs referencing enterprise_lms_notification_logs in the Prisma schema. Contains essential delivery status and metadata timestamps.

id.description: Primary Key.

transaction_code.description: Unique code identifying this payment transaction for tracking and reconciliation.

amount.description: Transaction amount in the specified currency.

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code for the transaction, e.g., USD, EUR.

payment_method.description: Method used for payment, such as credit card, PayPal, bank transfer.

status.description: Current status of the transaction, e.g., pending, completed, failed.

IEnterpriseLmsPaymentTransaction.ISummar.description: Paginated summary information of payment transactions referencing enterprise_lms_payment_transactions table. Contains the transaction key, amount, currency info, payment method, status, and timestamps.

id.description: Primary Key.

tenant_id.description: Tenant organization related to this event.

user_id.description: User who triggered or was affected by this security event.

event_type.description: Type of security event, e.g., login_success, permission_change, access_denied.

IEnterpriseLmsSecurityAuditLog.ISummary.description: Paginated summary of security audit logs with tenant, user IDs, event type, occurrence timestamp, and creation/update metadata.

IEnterpriseLmsBackupRecord.ISummary.description:
Summary information for a backup record.

This type provides essential identification and status properties for backup records within the Enterprise LMS.

Used for listing backup snapshots and monitoring backup status over time.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Unique identifier of the backup record.

backup_timestamp.description:
Timestamp when the backup was taken.

ISO 8601 date-time format.

backup_type.description:
Type of backup such as full, incremental, differential.

Describes the kind of backup performed.

storage_location.description:
Storage path or URL where the backup is stored.

Represents physical or cloud storage location.

backup_size_bytes.description:
Size of the backup in bytes.

Represents the storage size of the backup file.

status.description:
Current status of the backup, e.g., completed, failed, in_progress.

Indicates the operational state of the backup.

created_at.description:
Record creation timestamp.

Datetime when the backup record was created.

IEnterpriseLmsSystemAdmin.ISummary.description:
Summary information representing a system administrator user.

Includes identification, contact, and status details essential for system-level administrative operations.

Used in listings of system administrators for management interfaces or audit summaries.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Unique identifier of the system administrator user.

tenant_id.description:
Tenant organization identifier.

Links the system admin to the tenant organization.

email.description:
Unique email address for login and communications.

Used as the principal login identifier.

first_name.description:
First name of the system administrator.

Provides the given name for display and personalization.

last_name.description:
Last name of the system administrator.

Provides the family name for official records.

status.description:
Current status of the system administrator account (e.g., active, suspended).

Indicates whether the account is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description:
Record creation timestamp.

DateTime when the system administrator account was created.

IEnterpriseLmsOrganizationAdmin.ISummary.description:
Summary information for an organization administrator user.

This includes key fields required for user management and audit listing within tenant scopes.

Used in paginated responses for admin user lists and summary views.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Unique identifier of the organization administrator user.

tenant_id.description:
Tenant organization identifier.

Associates the admin with a specific tenant.

email.description:
Unique email address for login and communications.

Used for login and notifications.

first_name.description:
First name of the organization administrator.

Displayed in the admin interface and communications.

last_name.description:
Last name of the organization administrator.

Recorded for official purposes.

status.description:
Current status of the organization administrator account (e.g., active, suspended).

Indicates current operational state.

created_at.description:
Record creation timestamp.

DateTime when the organization administrator was registered.

IEnterpriseLmsDepartmentManager.ISummary.description:
Summary of a department manager user entity within the Enterprise LMS.

This summary contains key fields such as ID, tenant association, contact details, status, and creation timestamp.

Primarily used for listing and querying department manager users efficiently.

The structure supports tenant separation and role-based data access controls.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Tenant organization identifier.

Links this manager to the correct tenant organization.

email.description:
Unique email address for login and communications.

Serves as the username and contact point.

first_name.description:
First name of the department manager.

Used for interface display and official communication.

last_name.description:
Last name of the department manager.

Recorded for identity verification and contact.

status.description:
Current status of the department manager account (e.g., active, suspended).

Denotes operational status.

Record creation timestamp.

Timestamp when the department manager account was created.

id.description: Unique identifier of the guest user.

last_name.description: Last name of the guest user.
